While in the second state of his [[Cursed Seal of Earth]], Kimimaro jumps in the air, hits his opponent with his tail with a vertical spin, throws behind himself, and spins sideways, creating several bone spikes from his body, hitting his opponent.

== Trivia ==
* This technique's name is a reference to a type of needle-point holder, used in [[wikipedia:ikebana|ikebana]].
